sources.title: Apache Chief (1949) COLORIZED | Classic Western | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
KILL...KILL...KILLL...WAS THE APACHES' WAR CRY IN THEIR LAST BATTLE FOR SURVIVAL! 
The Apache Chief Young Eagle is trying to keep the peace treaty but his nephew Black Wolf who aspires to become Chief is killing settlers.

Director: Frank McDonald
Writers: George D. Green, Leonard S. Picker
Stars: Alan Curtis, Tom Neal, Russell Hayden & Fuzzy Night
Genres: Classics, Western

@CultCinemaClassics

sources.title: Apache Chief (1949) Alan Curtis | Classic Cowboy Western | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Filmed in savage fury...against new, exciting, natural backgrounds with a cast of HUNDREDS!
When his tribesmen begin killing off settlers, Chief Young Eagle is opposed to the carnage. In order to assure a lasting peace, however, the chief must deal with his renegade nephew Black Wolf.

Director: Frank McDonald
Writers: George D. Green, Leonard S. Picker
Stars: Alan Curtis, Tom Neal, Russell Hayden 
Genres: Classics, Western

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: The Apache Chief is trying to keep the peace treaty but his nephew Black Wolf who aspires to become Chief is killing whites. Caught, he is to be turned over to the soldiers but two of his followers free him. The Colonel had given the Chief six days to turn over Black Wolf or the tribe would be disbanded. With Indians killing other Indians and the deadline approaching, the Chief's son attempts to bring in Black Wolf but is captured by him.
metadata.Writer: George D. Green, Leonard S. Picker
metadata.Actors: Alan Curtis, Tom Neal, Russell Hayden
